title: Son says father fatally shot while cleaning gun
content:
HOUSTON -- A man says his his father was accidentally shot and killed Tuesday night while cleaning a gun inside his southeast Houston home.
Police say the shooting occurred in the 1300 block of Regal Street near I-45.
Carlos Zetino Jr. says he, his brother, Brandon Bosquez and his father Carlos Zetino Sr., 39, were fixing a gun when the firing pin went off, and the bullet went into his stomach.
"I was there when it happened," Zetino Jr. said. "I thought it was just a flesh wound, but when I opened it, it was deep inside. It was deep inside his body."
Zetino Jr. says he and his brother tried to give their father CPR. Bosquez said Zetino Sr. died shortly after ambulances arrived on scene.
